20110124220428.000|20110124220431.000|TR0|get an explosive past our screening when 
20110124220431.000|20110124220433.000|TR0|you're going to depart.  So they have 
20110124220433.000|20110124220435.000|TR0|found an area which is, in fact,

20110124221019.000|20110124221021.000|TR0|era of what he calls "hyper partisan 
20110124221021.000|20110124221023.000|TR0|talking points and canned anger."
20110124221023.000|20110124221026.000|TR0|
20110124221026.000|20110124221028.000|TR0|Wouldn't that be nice?
20110124221028.000|20110124221030.000|TR0|
20110124221030.000|20110124221032.000|TR0|Avlon points to several signs that 
20110124221032.000|20110124221035.000|TR0|Americans have had enough, including Keith 
20110124221035.000|20110124221037.000|TR0|Olbermann's departure from MSNBC, Glenn 
20110124221037.000|20110124221039.000|TR0|Beck's declining ratings and loss of 
20110124221039.000|20110124221041.000|TR0|advertisers over at the F word network, as 
20110124221041.000|20110124221043.000|TR0|well as Sarah Palin's plummeting approval.

20110124221956.000|20110124221958.000|TR0|STATES:  I want a job's bill on my desk

20110124222000.000|20110124222003.000|TR0|bipartisan fiscal commission.  I've

20110124222007.000|20110124222009.000|TR0|initiative.  The Senate should restore the 
20110124222009.000|20110124222012.000|TR0|pay as you go law.  We still need health 
20110124222012.000|20110124222014.000|TR0|insurance reform.
20110124222014.000|20110124222016.000|TR0|
20110124222016.000|20110124222018.000|TR0|(END VIDEO CLIP)
20110124222018.000|20110124222020.000|TR0|
20110124222020.000|20110124222023.000|TR0|BLITZER:  Our senior political analyst,

20110124225722.000|20110124225724.000|TR0|act like machines and go and parse a lot

20110124225802.000|20110124225804.000|TR0|subject, assembles it into this format
